tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FoodDiaryEntries (
    entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_name VARCHAR(50),
    calorie_count INT,
    entry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Recipe (
  recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_name VARCHAR(255),
  ingredients TEXT,
  instructions TEXT,
  calorie_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE calorie_intake (
  intake_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  entry_id UUID,
  intake_date DATE,
  calories_consumed INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (entry_id) REFERENCES food_diary(entry_id)
);

CREATE TABLE calorie_intake (
  intake_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  entry_id INT,
  intake_amount INT,
  intake_time TIME,
  FOREIGN KEY (entry_id) REFERENCES food_entry(entry_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  dietary_preference VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE recipe_suggestion (
  suggestion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  suggested_recipe VARCHAR(255),
  suggested_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profile(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FoodDiaryEntries (
  entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  meal_time VARCHAR,
  food_name VARCHAR,
  calories INT
);
